alert.note: Alert for Lafayette (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued March 12 at 8:44AM EST until March 12 at 11:00AM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1145 AM EST THIS MORNING... ...REPLACES FLASH FLOOD WARNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of Big Bend Florida, including the following counties, Lafayette and Taylor. * WHEN...Until 1145 AM EST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 844 AM EST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 0.5 and 2 inches of rain have fallen in the last 3 Hours. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Mayo, Perry, Fenholloway, Athena, Pinland, Foley, Smith, Bucell Junction, Perry-Foley Airport, Carbur, Townsend, Salem, Buckville, Hampton Springs, Cooks Hammock, Day, Blue Springs, Adams Beach, San Pedro Junction and Dekle Beach. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
